overview: Allan Weinstein serves as Vice President of Sales for CE Ortho and brings with him over 35 years of orthopaedic business experience. Having led private start-ups (large cap, small cap) and successfully directed mergers, acquisitions, fundraising and IPOs, Allan has strong relationships throughout the industry with corporations, manufacturers, service organizations, vendors, consultants, distribution channels, surgeons and key-note product champions. His areas of expertise include arthroplasty, trauma, sports medicine, extremities and biologics. He has held sales and marketing leadership positions with Howmedica, Acufex Microsurgical, Arthrocare Corporation, Nascent, Enterprise, Opus Medical, Axya, Regen Biologics, and Pegasus Biologics. Allan offers experience in domestic and international sales, marketing, product development, regulatory, operations, R&D, commercialization, and training and development. He has a strong client base and has provided consulting services to companies such as Arthrosurface, Scandius, OBI, OBL, TAG Medical, Royal Distributors and M.A.R.C. Alan holds a Bachelor of Science degree in business from Seton Hall University, in South Orange, New Jersey.
